text: Angelo Fagiani (18 April 1943 - 4 July 2020) was an Italian Roman Catholic archbishop.Archbishop Angelo Fagiani He was ordained to the priesthood in 1967. He was archbishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Camerino-San Severino Marche, Italy, from 1999 until 2007.Archdiocese of Camerino-San Severino Marche Fagiani died on 4 July 2020, aged 77. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian Roman Catholic archbishops
title: Angelo Fagiani
